404.user_description: No existe une usarie con este nombre!

500.title: Fallo Interno
500.description: Algo paso con el servidor que no te deja usar esta página.
500.alt_description: Esto probablemente no es vuestra culpa.

generic.try_again: Prueba otra vez en un momento...
generic.ratelimit_verbose: Tu límite de frecuencia de publicación se alcanzo!

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.badge_manage_empty: Somehow there are no existing badges. This shouldn't happen.
admin.badge_manage_add_protected: Cannot set that badge as it is done automatically
admin.badge_manage_remove_protected: Cannot remove that badge as it is done automatically
admin.badge_create_invalid_data_size: Badge data must be between 1 and 65536 characters in length
admin.badge_create_success: Reload for your changes to apply.
admin.badge_invalid_name_size: Badge name must be between 1 and 64 characters in length
admin.badge_invalid_name: Badge name can only contain a-z, 0-9, and underscores
admin.badge_not_found: A badge with the name '%s' doesn't exist!
admin.modify_invalid_bio_size: User bio is too long! It should be between 0 and 65536 characters.
admin.modify_invalid_display_name_long: Display name is too long! It should be between 1 and 300 characters.
admin.modify_invalid_display_name_short: Display name is too short! It should be between 1 and 300 characters.

home.title: Home
home.quote_blocked: This post is from an account you've blocked
home.quote_private: This person limits who can view their profile.
quote_placeholders: What did they do this time?
Yet another mistake to point out?

account.log_out_description: If you don't get redirected soon, click here...
account.invalid_username_chars: Username can only use A-Z, 0-9, underscores, and hyphens
account.invalid_username_length: Username must be between 1 and %s characters in length.
account.follow_blocking: You can't follow an account you're blocking!
account.block_self: Huh? Look, I get you hate yourself, but I can't let you do that.

messages.title: Messaging %s
messages.input_placeholder: What would you like to tell %s?
messages.yourself: Look, a lack of friends is a common issue, but you can't talk to yourself!
messages.blocked: You are blocked by this person!
messages.blocking_blocked: You are blocked by/blocking this user

post_page.comment_input_placeholder: Got something to say about this?

post.invalid_length: Invalid post length. Must be between 1 and %s characters.
post.invalid_comment_id: Idk your id is not right at all
post.invalid_quote_post: The post you're quoting doesn't exist!
post.invalid_quote_comment: The comment you're quoting doesn't exist!
post.invalid_username: Username is insvalagaeg... LOOK JUST SHUT UP

settings.title: Settings
settings.username_load_failure: Username couldn't be loaded! Try reloading the page?
settings.unload: You have unsaved changes! Are you sure you want to leave?
settings.profile_display_name_invalid_length: Invalid name length. Must be between 1 and %s characters
settings.profile_pronouns_invalid: Invalid pronoun string '%s'. If this is a bug, please report this
settings.profile_private_description: If your account is private, that means only you and people you follow can see your posts.
settings.cosmetic_theme_invalid: That's not a vailid theme, idiot.
settings.cosmetic_example_post_content: This is an example post. I am @example.
settings.account_password_failure: Unable to set your password! Reason: %s
settings.account_switcher_remove_error: You can't remove the account you're currently signed into!

user_page.private_warning: This account is private. Only users that they follow can see their posts.

logs.name: v0.9.2
changes: Added changelogs page
Added option backend to disallow scraping
Added an animation when liking a post
Added buttons to pages that previously didn't have them, like on the 404 page
Added links to the changelog and contact pages in settings

logs.name: v0.9.1
changes: Added an option to cache languages
Badge names can now use "w"
The server no longer errors when trying to log in to an account that doesn't exist
The maxlength parameter is properly set on the username section on sign up and log in pages
Updates to the Esperanto language
Buttons on posts on the notifications page function properly
Removed exclamation marks on 404 pages

logs.name: v0.9.0
changes: Added support for multiple languages (currently there's only English US/UK and Esperanto created by Subroutine)
Fixed a bug with quotes
Other minor bugfixes

logs.name: v0.8.6
changes: Added a fake profile picture next to your name. This is based off of your banner color

logs.name: v0.8.5
changes: Added hashtags

logs.name: v0.8.4
changes: Fixed an issue with the "hitboxes" of certain links on user pages
Added a lot of feature disabling options in the backend settings config

logs.name: v0.8.3
changes: Clicking the refresh button quickly no longer loads duplicate posts
Max line limit on quotes is smaller
Added unsaved changes alert to settings page
Added text to title to signify unread notifications
Added badges to private messages

logs.name: v0.8.2
changes: Fixed an issue with the text color of timestamps on message pages

logs.name: v0.8.1
changes: The lock icon on private accounts on /u/... pages is properly styled
@ mentions in messages no longer break everything
The link color in messages you send has been changed to make them visible

logs.name: v0.8.0
changes: Added private messages

logs.name: v0.7.4
changes: You can now pin one of your posts to your profile. This makes it show up before all of your other posts
The delete and unpin buttons are both colored red by default. In the future, there may be a setting to disable this

logs.name: v0.7.3
changes: You can change your password
Links on posts now open in new tab
Tweaks to post box heights
Changed the placeholder text on post boxes
Remade the top section of the post that has user info
Made quote and like buttons not work when logged out

logs.name: v0.7.2
changes: Added an extra parameter to urls to hopefully prevent any unwanted caching between versions

logs.name: v0.7.1
changes: Fixed the description on embeds for user profiles and added follower counts to it too

logs.name: v0.7.0
changes: Added notifications. These are triggered when you @ someone, when you comment on someone else's post, or when you quote someone else's post
You can view the post that a comment was commented on now via the link
Pressing enter on the log in and sign up pages submits the form now

logs.name: v0.6.8
changes: Administrative actions now get logged
The save button in settings stands out more
Post stats are now shown in embeds
Delete buttons now show on focused posts

logs.name: v0.6.7
changes: Added pronouns
Renamed all themes
Added a new theme with a black base instead of a dark blueish color

logs.name: v0.6.6
changes: Fixed a small oversight with blocking that still showed quoted posts from blocked accounts

logs.name: v0.6.5
changes: Blocking accounts
Slight modification to post input boxes
Delete button on smaller screens should no longer wrap to the next line

logs.name: v0.6.4
changes: Added caching for getting post lists to improve performance

logs.name: v0.6.3
changes: You can now view who someone follows and who follows them by clicking on the followers/following text on their profile

logs.name: v0.6.2
changes: Sending a request to create a badge that already exists now updates the svg content instead of 400-ing

logs.name: v0.6.1
changes: Creating/deleting badges no longer requires a server restart to update frontend

logs.name: v0.6.0
changes: Added account switcher
Added badges
Added post deletion
Added an admin page
Revamped the settings page
Bug fixes

logs.name: v0.5.2
changes: Added user bios
Changed a couple variable and function names in the backend

logs.name: v0.5.1
changes: Made the input box for posting/commenting/quoting a lot better to work with

logs.name: v0.5.0
changes: Added quoting posts

logs.name: v0.4.3
changes: Added documentation to the whole backend
Some small error handling changes

logs.name: v0.4.2
changes: Private accounts now function properly
A lot of backend changes
Some small bugs have been fixed

logs.name: v0.4.1
changes: Added gradient banners!
Added a shadow behind usernames in profiles
A couple of bugfixes

logs.name: v0.4.0
changes: Switched to an actual database
Added an admin page
Added a confirm password box on the sign up page
Random like counts on the settings page can no longer be zero
The share button now has the correct cursor
Added a border radius to posts in the settings page
Quotation marks no longer show as &quo; on posts
Added links to the home page on 404/500 pages
The recent tab is now the default tab for the home timeline
Removed the add/remove follower input
Remade all themes using catppuccin
Comments that have an id more than the most recent post can now load
Added a width limit to private text info on the settings page
The robots.txt file is now treated as plain text instead of html
Links and pings can no longer conflict
Static files are now served from /static/... by default
Banners are now shown at 100% opacity

logs.name: v0.3.8
changes: Added a profile button on the sidebar

logs.name: v0.3.7
changes: Added themes
